# Custom CSS

Test custom CSS in MDX.

<style>
  {`
    .a-custom-class {
      border: 10px solid hotpink;
    }
    .a-custom-classname {
      border: 10px solid blue;
    }
  `}
</style>

<div class="a-custom-class">
  <div className="a-custom-classname">This box should have BOTH a pink and blue border</div>
</div>
